resources.string: When you go to home you can see a card which shows you a news article. You can also click on the article to get to the entire article. If you\'re interested in the article you can swipe the article to the right, if not swipe it to the left. This app will remember what kind of topics you\'re interested in and show you more articles related to that topic. If you want to know what kind of requestResponse the app collects about you just go to My Statistics.

I\'m just a small developer and I use a free source for the news articles I\'m showing to you. That\'s why I can request news articles only up to 1000 times a month. Furthermore I don\'t get the entire article content, that\'s why I link to the entire article. So for now the usage of this app is limited but if I\'m able to generate any kind of revenue with this app I\'ll be able to pay for an upgrade of my news source.

I'm getting my news from NewsAPI.org.

By swiping NEWS ARTICLES we know which CATEGORIES you like.
By answering QUESTIONS we know which TOPICS you like.
Every day we adjust the news we show to you according to your preferred CATEGORIES and TOPICS.
In MY STATISTICS you can always check out the requestResponse we collected about you.
Swipe right if you like an article
Swipe left if you dislike an article
Swipe in any direction to start
